original_text: The Babylonians set fire to the royal palace and the houses of the people and broke down the walls of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 갈대아인들이 왕궁과 백성의 집을 불사르며 예루살렘 성벽을 헐었고

sentences.original_text: The Babylonians set fire to the royal palace
and the houses of the people
and broke down the walls of Jerusalem
